properties.areaDesc: San Diego County Mountains; Riverside County Mountains
properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 9 at 2:06PM PST until February 11 at 4:00AM PST by NWS San Diego CA
properties.description:
* WHAT...Snow expected. Plan on slippery road conditions,
including during the evening commute on Monday. Total snow
accumulations of 1 to 2 inches between 4000 to 5000 feet, 2 to
4 inches between 5000 to 6000 feet, and 5 to 10 inches above
6000 feet.

* WHERE...The Mountains of Riverside and San Diego Counties.

* WHEN...10 PM today to 4 AM Tuesday.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Be prepared for reduced visibilities at
times.
properties.instruction:
A Winter Weather Advisory for snow means periods of snow will
cause primarily travel difficulties. Be prepared for snow covered
roads and limited visibilities, and use caution while driving.

For road condition information in California...enter
8 0 0 4 2 7 7 6 2 3 if inside california or
9 1 6 4 5 5 7 6 2 3 if outside California.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO 4 AM PST TUESDAY ABOVE 4000 FEET
